text: Audio is part of us as humans.

Hearing is one of the first senses that
we develop in the womb.
Itâ€™s the way we communicate as humans.
It's language.

And advertisers can now tap into
this fantastic medium

and scale this to deliver a more 
personal way of communicating

that feels more relevant and is actually
more meaningful.

AudioStack accelerates the production
of audio, enabling brands

to speak more personally and
locally to their customers.
When it comes to audio production

we always tend to talk about the
triangle of time, scope and cost.

Creating a single asset will be
quicker, it will be cheaper,
but it won't be able to scale.

AI audio allows to be scaled so you
can deliver millions

of versions at a lower cost and
a faster speed.

The AWS Activate program is very
beneficial for our startup

because of course, cash is 
relatively scarce.

We get the POC credits and innovation
credits, and this helps you

try out new technology that might
have been cost prohibitive.

We got to work with solution architects
so we could make sure that

our architecture was scalable and
robust and cost efficient.

We recently became an AWS validated
software partner.
This has helped us gain credibility,
gain customer trust, but also,

enhance our service offering through
work with go-to-market teams.

The partnership allows us to jointly work
together to approach client targets
but also utilize AI as a creative tool.

One of our workflows is called
SonicSell.

This enables us to take text and
generate various audio ads

by picking voices based on
sentiment analysis,

but also picking sound based
on the tone of your voice.

With Amazon Bedrock we are
able to produce
more differentiated content much faster.

You have fully produced audio
asset in less than 60 seconds.
Part of what we deliver is

our own proprietary technology
that allows to elasticate audio.
That usually takes a lot of effort,

from a actual person to deliver
these different
lengths of advertising.

We're about a hundred times faster,
we're about 80% cheaper as well.

Being able to adjust something
on the fly

at any point or to tap into social
moments is a fantatic ability.
It's exciting to see that we're moving

with more clients, but also
into more regions.

AudioStack is enabling brands
to talk to consumers

in their own tone of voice
with their own slang
but also reach new consumers

that they weren't able to speak
to before.
